module.name: Embedded
module.author: Core

property.title: Background transparent?
property.helpText: Should the Widget be shown with a transparent background? Also requires the embedded content to have a transparent background.

property.title: Scale Content?
property.helpText: Should the embedded content be scaled along with the layout?

property.title: Preload?
property.helpText: Should this Widget be loaded entirely off-screen so that it is ready when shown? Dynamic content will start running off screen.

property.title: HTML
property.helpText: Add HTML to be included between the BODY tag.

property.title: Style Sheet
property.helpText: Add CSS to be included immediately before the closing body tag. Please do not include style tags.

property.title: JavaScript
property.helpText: Add JavaScript to be included immediately before the closing body tag. Do not use [] array notation as this is reserved for library references. Do not include script tags.

property.title: HEAD
property.helpText: Add additional tags to appear immediately before the closing head tag, such as meta, link, etc. If your JavaScript uses the [] array notation add it inside script tags here.
